name: The Void (itch) (Shaggles)
description:
INFO:

This is the beta for the game. There will be a competition running until the 19th of this December for anyone who plays it. All you have to do is speedrun the game, and at the end take a ss of the time you got. Then @ me on  Twitter. Whoever has the fastest time by 12 A.M. EST on the 19th of December wins!

The winner of the competition gets to help design a character that will be in the full game. (With limitations)

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,D - Movement

SPACE BAR - Jump [Hit again to double jump when you have the ability]

SHIFT KEY - Dash [When you have the ability]

E - Interact/Shoot

I - Inventory

M - Map

ESCAPE - Pause/Exit Menus

CREDIT:

Story:

Dangy helped me write the dialogue and story, go check him out:

Dangy's Instagram

Dangy's YouTube

Art:

The "I need shadow warp" art was done by my pals Fox and Toaster while bug testing.

Game Testing:

Toaster, this guy played and raged through my game about a 100 times. Absolute madman. (I'm sorry Toast)

Toast's YouTube
